TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XText extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 元素可以包含文本内容。XML elements can contain text content. 有时候，内容是简单 （该元素只包含文本内容），并且有时混合内容 （元素的内容包含文本和其他元素）。Sometimes the content is simple (the element only contains text content), and sometimes the content is mixed (the contents of the element contains both text and other elements). 在任一情况下，每个区块的文本表示为节点。In either case, each chunk of text is represented as an node. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 开发人员通常必须编写代码以使用任意[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]未创建的树。 developers will often have to write code to work with arbitrary [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] trees that they did not create. 如果您正在编写代码，必须使用[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]你可以创建没有控制树，你应注意的某些行为节点。If you are writing code that has to work with [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] trees that you have no control over creating, you should be aware of certain behaviors of nodes. 在处理 XML 树节点级别的内容时，你应准备多个节点可彼此相邻。When processing the contents of an XML tree at the node level, you should be prepared for multiple nodes to be adjacent to each other. 此外，您应该准备为包含没有文本的节点。Further, you should be prepared for nodes that contain no text. 可以通过[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]方法来移除文本节点的内容。It is possible through [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] methods to remove the content of a text node. 但是，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]不会自动删除该节点。However, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] does not automatically delete the node. 节点具有标识，并可能具有批注，因此[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]允许长度为零的节点在树中。The node has identity, and might have annotations, so [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] allows for zero-length nodes in the tree. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用节点进行编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/18680d1c-6e7c-4645-8d53-27b5a96f2d3f)。For more information, see [Programming with Nodes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/18680d1c-6e7c-4645-8d53-27b5a96f2d3f).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不会产生文本节点使用构造函数。You typically do not create text nodes by using the constructors. 当您在构造时传递文本内容，会自动创建文本节点。When you pass text content when constructing an , text nodes are automatically created. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个包含文本节点的元素。The following example creates an element that contains a text node. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Some text ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数主要用于在内部创建 XML 树的深层副本。This constructor is primarily used internally to make a deep copy of an XML tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将引发和事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取和设置此属性。The following example shows getting and setting this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); XText txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType().First(); Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); txtNode.Value = "New text"; Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); root.Value = "Newer text"; txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType().First(); Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Some text Dim txtNode As XText = root.Nodes().OfType(Of XText).First() Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) txtNode.Value = "New text" Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) root.Value = "Newer text" txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType(Of XText).First() Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text New text Newer text ```
